recipe.title: Triple-Cranberry Sauce
ingredients: 1 cup frozen cranberry juice cocktail concentrate, thawed
1 12-ounce package fresh or frozen cranberries, rinsed, drained
instructions: Combine cranberry juice concentrate and sugar in heavy medium saucepan. Bring to boil over high heat, stirring until sugar dissolves. Add fresh and dried cranberries and cook until dried berries begin to soften and fresh berries begin to pop, stirring often, about 7 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in orange marmalade, orange juice, orange peel and allspice. Cool completely. Cover; chill until cold, about 2 hours. (Can be made 3 days ahead. Keep refrigerated.)
